channel.title: personal development on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in personal development on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I want to know more about individual developers. YouDev has been released.
item.description: <img width="610" alt="eyecatch.png" src="https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/634341/275b16c8-3136-198f-fa76-a17a4cbb41e1.png"> YouDev has been released. 2020.5.01 YouDev is a service that focuses on individual developers to let them know more about them (I want to know…). Even if the service is recognized, I think that the developers have not hit the spot, so individual developers may not only appeal the services released by themselves, but also the developers themselves. I created it. I’m always looking for individual developers, so I’m an individual developer!

item.title: [Python] I want to publish a product at the lowest cost
item.description: Nice to meet you. It is Taro Man. I usually develop web services. -Siltrend #Introduction 彡(゜)(゜) “I want to make a service and publish it~” 彡(゜)(゜) “But, renting a rental server is a hassle**…” 彡(゜)(゜) “** Server fee ** I don’t want to pay…” Have you ever felt this way? There must be. Use the Heroku Free Plan for that. In this article, I will write about how to publish your application with Heroku’s free plan.

item.title: [Python] Django personal tips
item.description: This article is the last day of [Django Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/django). #Introduction Nice to meet you. Thank you. I usually develop web applications using Djnago. -Sill Trend This year’s Django Advent Calendar 2019 was also enjoyed every day. All the articles were interesting and informative. So, in this article, the last day of the calendar, I’d like to organize some basic and personal tips for Django. We hope that this article can help make Django even more popular.

item.title: [Python] I tried to imitate Python × Kivy de Kinoppy (Kinokuniya bookstore application)
item.description: This article is the 14th day of [Personal Development Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/private-development). And Qiita’s first post. Begin. I am creating a Windows app using a framework called Python x Kivy. ###background I cooked a paper book and made it into PDF. Refreshing! -Now read on your iPad -My child took an iPad… -I bought a Surface! Let’s read on Surface -Unlike iPad, there is no good app for Windows -Kinoppy (Kinokuniya bookstore app) Good!
